title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 891.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 891.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations
(a) The
designated waters are within the following areas: (1)

Jamaica Bay drainage basin within Kings
and Queens Counties and including Rockaway Inlet east of a north-south line
drawn from Light Inlet at the southeasterly tip of Coney Island peninsula near

Manhattan Beach to the westerly shoreline west of Lookout Tower on Rockaway

Point; and
(2)
a designated area
within Kings County tributary to New York Bay and bounded on the east by the
west limit line of Jamaica Bay drainage basin; thence bounded on the south by

Shore Parkway; thence bounded on the west by Fourth Avenue; and thence bounded
on the north by the south limit line of the Lower East River drainage
basin. (b) The
above-designated waters are located as shown on Map 1, section
891.7, infra, and as contained
within the topographical or basin limit line on the reproduced topographical
reference maps in section
891.9, infra. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
891.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
